notes.title: Availability of data and materials
notes.p: All raw data in the main text or in the supplementary materials are from Lindner, S. E. et al. (2019) ‘Transcriptomics and proteomics reveal two waves of translational repression during the maturation of malaria parasite sporozoites’, Nature Communications, 10(1). 10.1038/s41467-019-12936-6.
